1.content:
Roxas woke up all sweaty and out of breath. He sat there in his bed for a good 10 minutes, before he realized that he was dreaming. Why am I having these dreams?" He sat there for an hour thinking, and then fell asleep again. The moment he fell asleep he started having that dream again.
As he was looking around, he saw a figure fighting heartless. As the mystery person was fighting, Roxas noticed his unusual sword. On closer inspection, he saw that it wasn't a sword, but a Keyblade. After another minute the heartless were gone. The mystery person suddenly looked over and spotted Roxas. Cooley and calmly the person started walking over to Roxas. Roxas, out of instinct, wielded his Keyblade. At the sight of this, the mystery person also, wielded his Keyblade. They stood there for a fee moments in silence then Roxas broke it. "Who are you?""My name is Sora."What are you doing in my dream"?"I believe I am not in your dream, but you are in mine".

I don't know who you are, but I don't want you in my dream!With those words, Roxas charges at sora. Sora manages to easily evade this attack. Then, Sora strikes back with a blow. Sora gets a direct hit, and Roxas gets launched across the room.You little jerk!With that Roxas makes another attempt. This time Sora blocks with his Keyblade. The only thing that bugged Roxas was that Sora was using the Kingdom Key as well. But he thought there was only one of each key. Roxas now losing the clash, decided he had to act. He ducked, dodging Sora's attack by inches. Then spun around and attempted to hit Sora by surprise. But, to Roxas' surprise, Sora was one step ahead of him, and with one simple move, blocked Roxas' attack and hit Roxas with amazing strength. Roxas collapsed almost unconscious. Before Roxas fell into the black darkness, Sora whispered in his ear: "Did you really think you could beat.......your somebody?"And in the next moment, Sora had disappeared.
1.title: A New Dream

11.content: Roxas woke up in his bed, in his room. His head felt like it could split open any minute. He wasn't able to remeber anything that had happened that night. After resting for a couple hours, Roxas decides to go outside. All of a sudden, part of his memory started to return. He fell to the ground, unable to move. His head started to hurt again. After three minutes, everything stopped and went back to normal. He could faintly remember someone, a shadow of a person. While in his thoughts, he didn't see his best friend, Axel, walk up to him. HEY ROXAS!!! Wha..? Oh, hey Axel. What are ya thinking about? Nothing Axel. I just had some weird dream last night. What was your dream like? I don't know, I don't remember anything about it. While they were talking, Larxene appears. We have trouble!! What is it Larxene? We don't have time to put up with you today. I am going to pretend I didn't hear that. Heartless are attacking! Let's go Axel Larxene dissapears into blackness. Are you sure you are OK Roxas? Yes. Let's go. We have to beat the Heartless.
11.title: Chapter 2

info.description:
Roxas is a nobody, who is working for Organization XIII. But lately, he has been having strange dreams. In these dreams he feels a presence. A presence that feels connected to him.....read more of the story.

DO NOT ADD ANY CHAPTERS!! THIS IS MY PERSONAL STORY I AM WRITING. ANY CHAPTERS ADDED THAT ARE NOT BY ME WILL BE SUBJECT TO DELETE THEM.
